programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Harry Langford enlists McGarrett and Danny's help to track down a teenage British royal who has run away while under his protection; Grover, Tani and Junior work a 25-year-old murder case after a mysterious videotape arrives at headquarters.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Kopi Wale No I Ka I'a a 'Eu No Ka Ilo.
programme.desc: Duke is forced to steal crucial evidence from the police locker in exchange for his kidnapped granddaughter; Jerry goes under cover at a mental health facility to solve a murder.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Ka Hana a Ka Makua, O Ka Hana No Ia a Keiki
programme.desc: McGarrett and Five-0 take on the mob when a former boss is killed; Junior's friend is on the run after witnessing the murder.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Ka Lala Kaukonakona Haki 'Ole I Ka Pa a Ka Makani Kona.
programme.desc: McGarrett joins Junior and his SEAL team on a mission to capture an elusive person who is holding his mentor hostage; Gerard Hirsch and Kamekona help Grover and Tani on a murder case involving art stolen by Nazis during World War II.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The team discovers a Russian spy ring hiding on Oahu when a Russian submarine appears off the coast.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: After McGarrett's CIA agent friend is killed, he lets himself be captured by the group he thinks is responsible to find the killer; Tani questions whether she should tell McGarrett about the murder weapon she found at Adam's house.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a professor, who was found hanging from a tree after being tortured.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a man found stabbed in a peep-show booth, finding non-human hairs on the victim's body.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates when a fire engulfs a popular night club, killing 16 people and injuring 58 others.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team delves into "tweaker" culture after a brutal murder is followed by a near-fatal explosion at the home of a methamphetamine addict.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio witnesses a dramatic prison break and later discovers one of the escapees is a child molester/murderer he put away six months earlier.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A playboy who enjoys diplomatic immunity becomes Horatio's prime suspect after a model is killed in a hit-and-run accident during Fashion Week.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio delves into the world of modern treasure-hunting after a victim is found skewered to his yacht with a harpoon.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team finds a rape victim clinging to life after being beaten, and Horatio suspects an imprisoned rapist is somehow responsible for the attack.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: During the autopsy of a petty officer who seems to have died of natural causes, an armed man holds Wade, Sebastian and Danny hostage in the morgue.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a Navy commander's car is stolen with his baby inside, the team must determine if it was a targeted abduction.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Lasalle's brother, Cade, needs the team's help when he becomes a murder suspect -- and cannot remember what happened; Lasalle is determined to prove Cade's innocence, despite the wealth of evidence against him.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: How Much Pain Can You Take?
programme.desc: Baitfish murders a person close to the team in order to send a message to Pride; a citywide hunt for the elusive criminal takes place.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride has suspicions about a mole; new intelligence comes to light that indicates a breach at the ports.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride and the team must go on a dangerous undercover mission to retrieve a stolen missile and prevent an attack.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A blogger dedicated to exposing government corruption is murdered; during the investigation, it is revealed that a war crime may have occurred during a humanitarian effort in Bolivia.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a highly regarded Navy pilot is killed after crashing a new, high-tech jet at an air show, the team must determine if it was human or mechanical error.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates when a Navy drone pilot is murdered after using a black market drone to obtain military surveillance.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When an Australian Royal Navy Lieutenant is murdered in New Orleans, Special Agent Naomi Parsons (Kate Beahan) is sent to work with Special Agent Pride.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a petty officer is found dead, the team's participation in the annual Red Dress Run comes to a halt.
